name: City Tour Of Lima By Night & The Magic Water Circuit.
description: Our City Tour of Lima is the ideal introduction to see and learn more about the so called City of Kings. This is fantastic tour that shows the city gorgeously illuminated with a fantastic colonial architecture. Here you will receive enlightening insights into Lima's history as you stroll around its main colonial buildings. We end up our tour visiting the Magic Water Circuit of Lima, a fantastic place with impressive fountains that combine movement, lights, sounds and images. It is the largest water fountain compound in the world, certified by Guinness World Records. A nice place to visit while in Lima, it offers quite a different kind of attraction. The park has thirteen water fountains, some of them surprisingly original and some for visitors to explore.
